price: Mataifa mangapi tumeyaangamiza kabla yao, na wakapiga kelele, lakini wakati wa kuokoka ulikwisha pita.
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ
footnotes: Mataifa mengi tuliyateketeza kabla yao, wakapiga kelele kutaka msaada ilipo wafikia adhabu. Lakini huo haukuwa wakati wa kuiepuka adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
